content.prompt: Topic: The impact of technology on education in the 21st century.
content.instructions: You have 2 minutes to prepare. Use the mind map below to organise your ideas, then speak for 3-4 minutes. After your presentation, the examiner will ask follow-up questions.
mindMapNodes: Student engagement and motivation in digital classrooms
followUpQuestions: How has technology changed the way students learn compared to twenty years ago?
What are the main disadvantages of relying too heavily on technology in education?
Do you think traditional classrooms will eventually be replaced by online learning? Why or why not?
